short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Augment EUR-LEX reading with click-on definitions, articles and references to other documents with this chrome extenstion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While reading EU regulations this extension allows you to easily look up:
- In-document definitions and articles
- Other referenced EU legislation
- Legal latin phrases


What's new?

Version 0.71
- Reduced initial lag while marking up documents

Version 0.70
- Small GUI fixes
- TOC update

Version 0.69
- Small GUI fixes
- Corrected id parsing on certain OJ documents

Verison 0.68
- Added document info and warnings regarding document proposal, adaptation and in force status
- Small gui fix for some documents

Version 0.67
- Fixed wrapper error for proposals

Version 0.66
- Fix error identifying some articles
- Interpreter adjustments
- Adjustments to messages

Version 0.65
- Corrected annex naming
- Clarified error messages
- Alphanumeric articles and clauses can now be interpreted 

Version 0.64
- Fixed offline definition parsing for certain document types

Version 0.63
- Messages system add

Version 0.62
- Better estimate of scroll height on language change
- Small jump to article fix

- Fix for the EUR-LEX update to TOC.
- Fix error on jump to article

- GUI updates

- added "open in new tab" option to links, language selection and TOC

Version 0.37
- Fixed errors introduced by 0.36
- Changed how abbreviations are marked. Will now only match precise strings.

Version 0.36
- Changed parsing and markup of articles and documents. Time required reduced by 93 %

Version 0.35

Version 0.34

- Removed false positive matching for abbreviations

Version 0.29

Version 0.26

Version 0.11
